article_title: White House presses Israel's Gantz on aid for Gaza
sentence: Far  too  many  Palestinian  civilians,  innocent  civilians  have  been  killed.

article_title: White House presses Israel's Gantz on aid for Gaza
sentence: Last  week,  at  least  112  Palestinians  were  reportedly  killed  when  large  crowds  descended  on  lorries  carrying  aid  while  Israeli  tanks  were  present.

article_title: White House presses Israel's Gantz on aid for Gaza
sentence: Israel  said  the  tanks  fired  warning  shots,  but  did  not  strike  the  lorries  and  that  many  of  the  dead  were  trampled  or  run  over.

article_title: White House presses Israel's Gantz on aid for Gaza
sentence: The  Israeli  military  launched  a  large-scale  air  and  ground  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  after  the  group's  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  and  took  253  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: White House presses Israel's Gantz on aid for Gaza
sentence: More  than  30,500  people,  mostly  women  and  children,  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  health  ministry.
